trajectory_finalization
=======================

.. py:module:: trajectory_finalization


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   trajectory_finalization.finalize_loaded_trajectory
   trajectory_finalization.set_state_defaults


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: finalize_loaded_trajectory(dataset, loading_parameters)

   Function to apply some final postprocessing common to all input routines.

   :param dataset: The dataset, ShnitselDB object or None, if reading failed. Only individual trajectories will be post-processed here.
   :type dataset: xr.Dataset | ShnitselDB | None
   :param loading_parameters: Parameters to set some defaults.
   :type loading_parameters: LoadingParameters | None

   :returns: _description_
   :rtype: Trajectory | None


.. py:function:: set_state_defaults(dataset, loading_parameters)
